thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 6 of 1748
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: So many websites that advertise great fares are hard to book and very complicated. Most offering no seat confirmations. Prior to this booking, I tried an acclaimed website that offers cheap tickets and booked my flight with a confirmation to find out the next day they cancelled on me and would not offer the same price that I had initially gotten. When this happened I went to FlightHub and got a great price with simple booking. I will come back to this website for all of my future bookings!
